Text: I'm having a little bit of a problem here. I replaced the folders and all, but when i run the setup it is not able to find the vba6.msi file under the support folder. The message displays it as suppoty/VBA/vba6.msi.  As of now I only know that it has something to do with the windows installer. Perhaps something got messed up while I was fiddling with the whole process. If you have any advice on how to fix the problem I'd appreciate it.
